Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute near Addison/Clark
ShortDescription: #152 Addison buses temp. rerouted EB: Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted and Addison; WB Addison, Halsted, Belmont, Racine and Addison: near Addison/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Addison/Clark, due to street blockage near Addison/Clark.

Eastbound buses will operate via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted and Addison including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via Addison, Halsted, Belmont, Racine and Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.
